    • About Nick Shivers


    As a principal broker in the top 1% of realtors nationwide, Nick Shivers leads the Nick Shivers Team at Keller Williams Realty Portland Central. His 18 years in the Portland Metro and Southwest Washington real estate markets has allowed him the privilege to serve thousands of clients. Our Mission is Serving People Saving Kids all by selling real estate. This mission has served us well by partnering with our clients through Sell a Home Save a child, something we co-founded. We have had the incredible opportunity to make a difference in the lives of hundreds of children. By donating a percentage of every closing, we are impacting the lives of children and building a brighter tomorrow.

    Nick Shivers
